bonus: Attempt a research check on something in the town.
Attempt a research check on something in the country.
Attempt a Persuasion of DC 15, on a success you and one other Red Banner may increase their Wage Progression (the other may choose a job) by 1.
Attempt a research check on something on the plane.
Attempt a Persuasion of DC 15, on a success a boat of your choice comes 1 week faster (other then the trade fleet).
Attempt a Persuasion of DC 15, on a success a Place of Worship gains your Job Tier in followers.
You automatically succeed on the next Research Complication check.
